Text: The game keeps freezing while loading the monsters inc level. Is anyone else experiencing this?
so far so good on wiiflow

@raffy836

yeah same thing here beat the first universe and next one wont load
It freezes on Alice in Wonderland and The Lion King.  I've beat Pirates (twice, acquiring additional costumes).  But, so far no good.  Help?

Try updating your cIOS to d2x v6 (base 56 for slot 249 or base 57 for slot 250), and make sure you have updated your loader to the latest version.

http://www.wiihacks.com/other-faq-guides-tutorials/88654-d2x-cios-installation-guide.html

i am having the same problem once i move on to another level it freezes while loading that level, it just gets stuck looping the same sound over and over again. ive tried updating my cIOS like shirepirate suggested, and ive tried updating my wiiflow to the latest version but none of that is working. Does anyone have any suggestions as to what i can do to fix the problem? IM DYING TO PLAY THIS GAME FULLY!
